PromotionMarketSegment.name: PromotionMarketSegment
PromotionMarketSegment.description: Represents a relationship between a promotion and Data Cloud segment. It indicates the segments targeted for a particular promotion.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the promotion. This field is only available in orgs where multiple currencies are enabled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MarketSegmentId.description: The ID of the market segment associated with the promotion market segment.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the promotion market segment.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion associated with the promotion market segment.

PromotionSegmentId.description: The ID of the related promotion segment. This field is accessible in orgs with a Commerce Cloud license, where users have access to Promotions.
